*Stingtra continues walking around and walks near the forest. Then from beh=
ind her Wrath comes still not repaired and grabs her machine gun* Stingtra:=
 *gasp* YOU DAMNED MAXIMAL! *Stingtra lungs at but Wrath hits her in face w=
ith her own machine gun and she falls down* Wrath: tisk tisk tisk! Your lun=
ging isn't gonna help you! *Wrath kicks Stingtra in the gut and picks her u=
p by her black hair* Wrath: I always come back! *Wrath thorws Stingtra to t=
he ground opens fire on her with his shoulder cannons. He then stops and sh=
oots rapidly with the Machine gun he took from her* Stingtra: I don't know =
what you mean that We're no better then you....Just because we had a small =
army....Well....You can't beat me unless you steal my weapon...But you can'=
t steal this... *Stingtra climbs to her feet and Wrath charges at her but s=
he shoots her eye lasers at him* *Wrath grunts but punches Stingtra* *Mech =
fluid pours out of Stingtra's mouth but she still stands* *Wrath drops the =
machine gun and pulls his sword out slashing Stingtra's arm open and mech f=
luid pours out of it* Wrath: The only way you can beat me is if your mech f=
luid can hurt me! *Wrath grabs Stingtra and throws her into a tree sending =
her into stasis lock* Wrath: I don't have to be repaired to fight. I always=
 win! It's all in mind, the weapons and the strengh! *Wrath says as he turn=
s away from Stingtra and then turns back and laughs and then runs off* *Sti=
ngtra comes out of stasis lock and climbs up a tree very slowly and then si=
ts there. She looks at her Commlink and reachs for it but then stops* Sting=
tra:.....I...don't need.......friends....... *Stingtra goes back into stasi=
s lock and sits in the tree*
